column2: all I would be doing is echoing the thousands of others that love this place.  My buddy and I were in the neighborhood and started at Haymarket
column3: where we were told that the wait was about 40 minutes.  We headed to Au Chevel
column4: and got the wait down to 35 minutes.  Took a stab at Little Goat
column5: where the dining room wait was 30 minutes
column6: but we were invited to try our luck at the bar.  While crowded
column7: we were able to get a couple stools together.
